She sits gracefully in the center of a three-dimensional card-like scene, like a pop-up holiday card. A ribbon bow is tied in the upper right corner. A surrounding red rectangle forms the outer frame of the composition, creating the illusion of a large, unfolded card enveloping her. At the top center of the background, "Merry Christmas" is written in elegant cursive.

The lady must gracefully kneel on a double-layered velvet table, shaped like a white cake adorned with red ribbons. The tabletop is covered with soft, long-haired faux fur, giving it a fluffy and charming appearance; both layers are decorated with horizontal red ribbons and bows.

Her left leg is naturally bent, with the knee slightly higher than her hip (approximately 15-20 degrees upward). Her right leg extends diagonally downward at approximately 40 degrees, forming a soft and slender curve. The right foot rests lightly on the ground, toes slightly turned inward; the heel is slightly raised, adding tension and elegance to the overall lines.

Her right arm extends forward and downward, her fingers resting lightly on the edge of the chair, forming a graceful diagonal line with her right leg. Her left hand rests gently on her raised left knee, her fingertips lightly touching the dog's back to stabilize it, while maintaining the natural curve of her wrist and fingers.

The dog must sit on her lap, positioned in the center of her left thigh, its head slightly turned towards the camera.

Her chin is tilted slightly downward at about 5 degrees, her gaze fixed on the camera, a slight upturn at the corners of her mouth revealing a confident and warm smile. Her head is slightly tilted to the right shoulder, creating an elegant asymmetry that balances the composition.

Her overall posture exudes a composed yet stylish aura—orderly yet relaxed. The dynamic triangular lines of her arms and legs guide the viewer's eye, ultimately landing on her face and the dog.

Her torso faces the camera directly, but is slightly rotated 5-10 degrees to the left hip, maintaining a slender S-curve. Her back is straight, her shoulders relaxed and balanced.

The chair's height was proportionate to her figure, just below her knees. The soft velvet material gently reflected light, creating a warm and comfortable contrast with the minimalist studio space.

The lighting was bright yet soft, with the main light positioned at a 45-degree angle in front of her, slightly above eye level. The color temperature was approximately 5000K, creating a warm, neutral tone that highlighted the smooth texture of her skin and the soft sheen of the fabric. There were no harsh shadows; the overall image was clean, crisp, and harmonious.

She wore a red and white layered outfit. The inner layer was a fitted white turtleneck top made of fine cotton-Lycra knit fabric (approximately 180-200 grams per square meter), with a matte, smooth texture that hugged her figure while maintaining elasticity and softness. The turtleneck was approximately 6 centimeters high, hugging her neck. The sleeves were slightly longer than her wrists, creating a soft visual effect.

The outer layer was a sleeveless red wool-blend overall mini dress with a soft A-line silhouette. The dress features a deep V-neck with two fabric-covered buttons at the center. The fabric is a medium-weight twill wool (320-350 g/m²), with a subtle twill weave and a velvety softness that subtly shimmers under soft lighting. The skirt length reaches mid-thigh (approximately 42-45 cm from the waist), creating a harmonious proportion while maintaining a modern, playful feel.

Her accessories perfectly complement the festive atmosphere: a red satin bow headband (approximately 5 cm wide) symmetrically worn on her head, gleaming smoothly in the light; white mid-calf ribbed cotton socks paired with burgundy patent leather Mary Jane shoes with a double-strap design, a rounded toe, and a 6-7 cm heel.

Generate four cohesive cinematic winter portraits. clothingin vivid cherry red (HEX #E60026), bright and luminous, never dull or desaturated.

Scene: Snowy outdoor scene in Europe at dusk

Lighting: cool-white key from upper front-right ≈6200K with gentle frontal fill ≈5600K; warm spark glow ≈3000K appears only in the bottom-right frame without tinting the skin. Depth of field about f/1.8; brightness and saturation consistent across all four images. Wardrobe includes a thick rib-knit short-sleeve sweater, matching scarf, and fingerless sleeves; sleeve length is fixed from the base of the palm to mid-forearm (~20 cm) in every frame.

Top Left (Frame 1 — Mid-close gaze down-left must)
Lens: 85mm, frame ratio 4:5.
Camera at eye level, ~1.0 m distance.
Chest-up composition, must subject fills ~70% of frame.
Head turned 15° right, facing right-front; right hand lifts scarf near lips; must left hand relaxed No lifting.
Gaze directed down-left,absolute not at the camera.
Right side lit, left softly shadowed — calm and thoughtful mood.

Top Right (Frame 2 — Tight portrait close-up)

A detailed facial close-up capturing the face and scarf. Snow rests clearly on the hair and scarf, with strands of hair slightly lifted by the wind. 
Left hand gently touch scarf center near collarbone; eyes look straight at camera.
Snow rests on hair and lashes; the face is the brightest point, red knit softly reflective.

Bottom Left (Frame 3 — Upward gaze to sky)
Lens: 50mm, frame ratio 4:5.
Camera low, at chest height from right 30°, ~1.4 m distance.
Subject fills ~55–60% of frame, body turned ~20° left.
Hands joined in prayer near right chest, fingertips upward; gaze lifted toward the distant upper-right sky.
Head tilted up ~25°, calm and dreamy expression.
Cool key light defines contours, emphasizing red knit texture.

Bottom Right (Frame 4 — Sparkler, looking to camera)
Lens: 50mm, frame ratio 3:4.
Camera from front-left 35°, slightly below eye level (~10 cm), distance ~1.3 m.
BodyMust be maintained angled ~25° right; right hand holds a sparkler near chest, left hand supports beneath.
Eyes directed to camera, soft smile.
Cool white light brightens right face, spark glow adds warm reflection on left cheek — bright, festive balance.

All four frames maintain identical proportions, brightness, and saturation; the red hue stays vivid and clean.
Each shot presents cinematic lighting, gentle snow atmosphere, and precise camera alignment — evoking warmth and elegance in a cohesive winter holiday portrait series.

Use the uploaded full-body photo as the main subject.
Do not alter the person’s face, facial features, identity, hairstyle, makeup, body shape, pose, or outfit — keep all colors, patterns, and accessories exactly the same. Replace only the background.

Place the person standing outside a luxury fashion boutique with a glass window display.
Inside the window, add a giant Q-style mascot/doll version of the same person, standing on a low pedestal and wearing the identical outfit.

Enhance the doll’s realism and refinement — increase its fine details, craftsmanship, and texture quality, with delicately sculpted facial features, smooth material transitions, realistic reflections, and premium finishing to make it appear more exquisite and high-end.
Let the person outside interact naturally with the doll inside — such as gently raising a hand toward the glass, as if touching or caressing the doll’s cheek through the window, while looking toward the camera with a soft expression.

Decorate the boutique interior with Christmas elements: pine garlands, ornaments, glowing fairy lights, and festive flower arrangements.
Show realistic glass reflections and contrast between the warm, cozy indoor lighting and the brighter outdoor daylight.
Keep framing at eye level, medium-wide, showing both the person and the doll clearly through the glass.

Make the overall lighting warmer, brighter, and more inviting, enhancing the Christmas mood.
Use soft golden and amber tones, gentle reflections of fairy lights, and subtle sparkles from ornaments to create a glowing, festive ambience.
Ensure the person outside is well-lit by natural daylight, appearing clear, bright, and detailed, while not blocking the view of the doll inside the window.
Maintain realistic detail, natural skin, accurate outfit texture, and no extra people, text, or logos.
Keep the person’s facial features and expression exactly the same as in the uploaded photo — the face must look identical and lifelike.

The model’s pose, facial features, hairstyle must remain completely unchanged.
The image should maintain the same framing, camera angle, and lighting as the original scene.

A cinematic fisheye shot capturing a Christmas night scene at the doorstep.
The composition uses a 180° ultra-wide fisheye lens (around 8–12mm focal length), positioned at chest height, slightly below the character’s eye level (about 10 cm lower), creating a circular distortion that curves the doorway and brick walls around the subject.
This produces an immersive doorbell camera perspective, placing the viewer inside the doorway while the character stands outside, Wearing a Christmas outfit and a Santa hat , holding a small wrapped gift directly toward the lens.

Lighting setup follows a three-point night contrast scheme:

Key light: warm wall lamp on the right side (≈3200K), illuminating the subject’s right cheek and torso with soft highlights.

Fill light: diffuse reflection from snow on the ground (≈4800K), brightening the lower half of the frame and softening facial shadows.

Rim/back light: cool ambient streetlight (≈5500K) outlining the hat and shoulders with a cold blue accent, enhancing separation from the dark background.

The surrounding scene includes snow-covered suburban houses and parked cars, softly blurred due to a shallow depth of field (f/2.8–f/3.5).
Falling snowflakes are frozen mid-air by fast shutter capture, adding a cinematic motion-still texture.

The visual tone is a deliberate blend of holiday warmth and psychological tension — the cheerful red Santa outfit contrasts against the cold night environment, while the fisheye distortion creates an unsettling intimacy.
Color temperature contrast between warm interior light and cool outdoor illumination (≈2500K vs 6000K) enhances the surreal holiday mood.

tasks.prompt:
Pixar風 Q版黏土質感聖誕水晶球，放置在真實雪地夜景中，四周是冷色調松樹與月光照耀的深藍森林，背景亮度略暗、微霧化，以凸顯球體明亮。細雪緩緩飄落。
中距離微俯視正面構圖，焦點完全鎖定水晶球內部，玻璃乾淨通透，外部冷藍月光與球內琥珀暖光形成強烈冷暖對比。
底座為雙層弧形溫潤木質雕刻，霧面質感，中央刻有襯線字體「MERRY CHRISTMAS」。

球內為Q版黏土造景，整體呈現柔霧霧面、邊緣圓潤、材質如黏土與毛氈，無塑膠感、無金屬光。
角色分層：

角色A（聖誕老人）：Q版比例（頭大身小、四肢短圓），位於中央偏左，紅色聖誕帽與白色毛球、厚實紅外套、黑色皮帶、黑靴，100%完全鎖定頭髮與鬍鬚為純白色黏土質地、柔霧無反光、鬍鬚蓬鬆圓潤、細節明確，黑色珠狀眼、表情可愛溫暖，獨立層次清晰，動作為主導堆雪人。

角色B（第二角色）：Q版比例（約0.8倍聖誕老人大小），站在右側協助堆雪人，與角色A保持清楚分離，無交錯或融合。臉部與髮型完全鎖定使用者提供照片，特徵清晰、表情柔和自然、臉部光線明亮具辨識度。
服裝與配件完全依照使用者提供圖片設計與顏色，不可更動或簡化；加戴紅色聖誕帽，白色毛絨滾邊與毛球，質感柔軟霧面。

背景中，小木屋窗光橘黃溫暖，聖誕樹燈光柔亮，屋外雪地厚實蓬鬆、反光柔和；雪人小巧可愛、比例協調。
整體氛圍童話可愛、Q版溫馨，球體為畫面最亮焦點，呈現高對比、夢幻般的Pixar黏土聖誕奇境。

They are framed perfectly in the center of the image, front-facing with a symmetrical, waist-up composition like a movie poster. Do not change the camera angle — the couple must remain exactly in the middle of the frame.

The woman must look exactly like Image1 in all aspects. Do not alter her hairstyle or facial structure. She is not wearing sunglasses. She wears a crimson red velvet jumpsuit with a form-hugging design, tailored to highlight her curves with clear body contour and visible bust shape — subtly defined through the tight fabric without excessive exposure. The neckline should be low-cut but tasteful, showing the upper chest and collarbones, suggesting sensuality without being overly revealing. The fabric is soft, slightly glossy, and drapes cleanly across her silhouette. A gold metallic belt cinches her waist as a bold fashion accent. She carries a large light brown cloth sack filled with money. The sack must not have handles or straps — do not make it look like a shopping bag. She either holds it in both arms, supports it against her hip, or rests it across one shoulder. The sack appears rugged, made of canvas or burlap, with realistic folds and texture.

The man must look exactly like Image2 in all aspects. Do not describe or reinterpret his face, hair, or expression — strictly follow the original appearance in Image2 without any modifications. He wears a red velvet Santa hat and a matching long red velvet coat with thick white fur trim. The red is vivid and saturated. Beneath the coat, he wears a tight white sleeveless undershirt with a scoop neckline that reveals part of his chest and upper abs. A wide black leather belt with a silver buckle wraps around his waist. He wears deep red velvet pants and worn black boots. He wears black aviator sunglasses.

The alley is gritty and cinematic: dirty snow, muddy footprints, scattered bills, brick buildings with rusty fire escapes, dented metal bins, and crates. Lighting combines warm orange tones from streetlamps with cool blue ambient shadows. The environment stays neutral and grounded. The couple's bold red outfits stand out as the visual focus. The scene should feel like a stylish holiday crime film — bold, alluring, and sharply composed.

User Prompt
Transform the uploaded subjects into a two-person Christmas portrait while keeping their faces, hairstyles, and hair colors exactly the same—realistic and fully recognizable. Change only pose, wardrobe, and background.

Composition & Camera (fix angle/scale)
Frame as a tight medium two-shot (3:4 or 4:5). Camera height at the front subject’s eye line—no high/low angle, no Dutch tilt.
Lens 50–70 mm (full-frame equiv.), aperture f/2.8–f/3.2 for sharp faces and creamy bokeh.

comments.folder_structure: Each task folder should contain 'Source' and 'Generated_Output' subfolders. For multi-image tasks, also include 'Additional' subfolder.
comments.reference_folder: Optional: Path to folder containing third set of images for 3-way comparison
comments.template_usage: use_comparison_template: true uses comparison_template_path (3 placeholders), false uses template_path (2 placeholders)
comments.use_multi_image: Set to true to enable dual-image mode from Additional folder, false for single-image mode
comments.output_group_tasks_by: Set to 0 (or omit) to create individual reports per task. Set to N (e.g., 4) to group N tasks into one combined report. Example: with 4 tasks and group_tasks_by=4, creates 1 report; with 8 tasks, creates 2 reports.

multi_image_config.enabled: Must be true to use multi-image features
multi_image_config.mode: sequential: consistent reproducible pairing | random_pairing: randomly select from Additional folder
multi_image_config.folders: Array of folder paths to select additional images from (typically ['../path/to/folder/Additional'])
multi_image_config.allow_duplicates: true for sequential mode (recommended) | false: try to avoid repeating combinations in random mode

comments.multi_image_example_single: Set 'use_multi_image': false to process only images from Source folder without additional images
comments.multi_image_example_dual: Set 'use_multi_image': true with multi_image_config to pair Source images with Additional folder images sequentially
